c74object.name: maxscore.net.send
c74object.digest: Send and receive MaxScore messages over a network
c74object.description:
maxscore.net.send
and
maxscore.net.recv
are Max abstractions which send and receive MaxScore data over a TCP network connection. maxscore.net.send's right-most inlet receives messages to fill a buffer and requires a bang on its left-most inlet to sent the compressed messages to a correpsonding maxscore.net.recv object listening to the same port. maxscore.net.recv decompresses the messages and passes them to the Max world.

method.name: anything
method.description: Messages go to the right-most inlet where they fill a buffer.

method.name: bang
method.description: A bang sends the content of the buffer to a receiving maxscore.net.recv object.

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: Set the IPv4 address for the messages to be sent to.

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: Set the number for the port the receiver is listening on.

example.caption: maxscore.net.send collects messages and sends them to a receiver
